name: THE PEEKING FOX
description:
A procedurally generated tilemap, taking its inspiration from folklore, in particular, the story of a fox who would enchant men in the village and take them away.

 They say that the whole of the village was surrounded by a lake of blood from those who have fallen to the charms of the fox.

This game serves as a demonstration of procedural generation and has minimal interactivity allowing the player to explore the environment. 

Pick your map and explore!
